name: Police Rampage 3D (Car Racing & Shooting Game)
description:
Police Rampage 3D (Car Racing & Shooting Game)

Escape the cops in wild racing and shooting 3d game.

Don't stop for anything else you will get smashed by uncontrolled cops chasing your car.

Survive as long as possible and Destroy police cars chasing you by:-
> Launching missiles.
> Dropping mines.
> Placing spikes
> Spilling oil barrels
> Come out of car and shoot at cops….. etc.

Features:
> Totally New, Easy and fun game mechanics.
> Tons of mission to accomplish.
> 4 visually amazing and challenging 3D Sets.
> Simple, smooth and effective Controls.
> Astonishing physics brings chaos to another level.
> Intelligent cops driving Muscle / SUV / Hummer cars.
> Hours of addictive Gaming.
> Vibrant and cool sound effects.
